alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 12 at 2:51PM PST until December 14 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with damaging gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Mountains and Santa Barbara County Mountains. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. &&

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Mountains
